title: Fix unit test bundle loading failure in xcodebuild test
description:
Running Command line invocation:
    /Applications/Xcode-26.3.0-Release.Candidate.app/Contents/Developer/usr/bin/xcodebuild -project TicketParty.xcodeproj -scheme TicketParty -destination platform=macOS test "-only-testing:TicketPartyTests"

Resolve Package Graph

Package: ticketpartypackage

Package: unknown fails before executing tests with: 'The bundle “TicketPartyTests” couldn’t be loaded because its executable couldn’t be located.' Investigate target/test-host packaging and test bundle executable settings so unit tests can run in CI/local CLI.

title: Integrate per-project Codex sidecar and ticket send flow
description: Implement docs/codex-sidecar-integration-plan.md: add project workingDirectory, CodexManager actor for per-project sidecar processes, sidebar Codex status entry, Send to Codex in ticket detail, and streaming output area.
close_reason: Implemented per-project Codex sidecar process manager, project working directory, sidebar Codex status view, and ticket send/output UI.

title: Scaffold codex-supervisor target and launchd just tasks
description: Add SwiftPM executable target + stub main, update persistent supervisor plan, and add Justfile recipes for build/install/start/stop/status.
close_reason: Implemented supervisor target scaffold, docs update, and Justfile automation tasks

title: Add supervisor health check and Agents page status
description: Connect app to codex-supervisor with a health check and display supervisor status at top of Agents/Codex screen.
close_reason: Added supervisor health check and surfaced status at top of Agents page

title: Stabilize UI launch tests in non-authorized environments
description:
Command line invocation:
    /Applications/Xcode-26.3.0-Release.Candidate.app/Contents/Developer/usr/bin/xcodebuild -project TicketParty.xcodeproj -scheme TicketParty -destination platform=macOS test

Resolve Package Graph

Package: ticketparty

Package: unknown currently fails because UITest launch tests call  and the runner is not authorized for those UI testing actions in this environment. Update tests to skip appearance toggles when unavailable, or gate those assertions behind an authorization check so full-suite runs are reliable.

title: Implement supervisor socket handshake between app and codex-supervisor
description: Add unix socket listener in codex-supervisor and use hello handshake in app health checker.
close_reason: Socket handshake wired in app health check and Agents status
